overview: Written and directed by San Diego based musician and filmmaker Jason Blackmore, Records Collecting Dust documents the vinyl record collections, origins, and holy grails of alternative music icons Jello Biafra, Chuck Dukowski, Keith Morris, John Reis, and over thirty other underground music comrades.
tagline: ...A DOCUMENTARY FILM ABOUT THE MUSIC AND RECORDS THAT CHANGED OUR LIVES
title: Records Collecting Dust
